column5: Deleted post. Don't want to offend members by posting pictures of fish and location of catch
Why give up a great soot to others like that? Part of fishing is exploring for yourself.
Exactly right. Spots are to be shared judiciously with good friends, not whored out on the world wide web.
Exactly!!!! Would of been better to take some photos and released it for another person to catch. Would of been a good way to teach a 6-year old CPR.
